name: MLC-SVM1.03
short_description: This C/C++ software package MLC-SVM 1.03 consists of three SVM-type multi-label classification algorithms: Rank-SVM [Elisseeff & Weston, NIPS,2011], SVM-ML (i.e., Rank-SVMz) [Xu, ESWA, 2012] and Rank-CVM [Xu, PR, 2012,], where “z” means that a zero label is considered. All three algorithms were coded and tested using MFC++6.0. For the first two methods, our linear programming solver is LPSOLVER5.5 [Stiena, 2006]. Such a package is upgraded from SVM-ML1.00, in which the first two methods were involved only.
summary: A C/C++ SVM-type Software Package for Multi-label Classification
